items.prediction: Mobile operating systems (iOS, Android, HarmonyOS) will prioritize native integration of AI-powered widgets and quick access features by 2025. This will transform smartphones into more proactive and intelligent personal assistants capable of anticipating user needs, streamlining daily tasks, and providing contextual information on the go.

items.title: Windows 10 用户面临安全漏洞风险
items.summary: A user expresses a strong desire to continue using Windows 10, despite growing concerns about potential security vulnerabilities as the operating system approaches or passes its end-of-life. This highlights the ongoing challenge of OS lifecycle management, user preference versus crucial security updates, and the inherent risks faced by individuals or organizations choosing to remain on unsupported or less secure older versions.
items.prediction: Microsoft will continue to face challenges with a significant segment of users adhering to older Windows versions, potentially leading to an increased market for third-party extended security updates or specialized security solutions for Windows 10 beyond its official end-of-life. However, this will come at a cost to users and with inherent security risks through 2026.
